qas.question: What kind of notoriety have wrestlers achieved?
What did the Rock 'n' Wrestling Connection do?
What are some other career paths wrestlers embarked on?

answers.text: music, acting, writing, business, politics or public speaking

context: From the first established world championship, the top professional wrestlers have garnered <a0_0>fame within mainstream society<a0_0/>. Each successive generation has produced a number of wrestlers who extend their careers into the realms of <a2_0>music, acting, writing, business, politics or public speaking<a2_0/>, and are known to those who are unfamiliar with wrestling in general. Conversely, celebrities from other sports or general pop culture also become involved with wrestling for brief periods of time. A prime example of this is The Rock 'n' Wrestling Connection of the 1980s, which <a1_0>combined wrestling with MTV<a1_0/>.
